title: Tokimeki Memorial: Only Love
original_name: ときめきメモリアル Only Love
sinopse:
The anime main line story revolves around a second year high school student, Riku Aoba, who has just recently transferred to the holy cross high school, where he notices, upon joining, several unique and funny occurrences, often being the target of a series of events and races administered by the student council and its fun-seeking president.

(Source: Wikipedia)
